SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data

SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data Struct Reference

Data structure used to describe a refinement operation between patch data components on an AMR hierarchy. More...

#include <source/SAMRAI/xfer/RefineClasses.h>

 Destination patch data component.
int d_src
 Source patch data component.
int d_src_told
 Patch data component for source data at the old time in a time interpolation operation.
int d_src_tnew
 Patch data component for source data at the new time in a time interpolation operation.
int d_scratch
bool d_fine_bdry_reps_var
 Boolean flag that is set to true when it is desired that fine data values have priority over coarse data values when data exists at the same location in the mesh on levels with different resolutions (e.g., nodes that are coincident on consecutive mesh levels).
bool d_time_interpolate
 Boolean flag telling if this item uses time interpolation.

 Refinement operator.
tbox::Pointer< hier::TimeInterpolateOperator > d_optime
 Time interpolation operator.
int d_class_index
 Index of equivalence class where this item belongs. All items of the same equivalence class will have the same value.
int d_tag
 An array index telling where this item sits in an array of refine items.
tbox::Pointer< VariableFillPattern > d_var_fill_pattern
 VariableFillPattern that can restrict the stencil of the data filled by the RefineSchedule.

Detailed Description

Data structure used to describe a refinement operation between patch data components on an AMR hierarchy.

Member Data Documentation

int SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_dst

Destination patch data component.

Source patch data component.

int SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_src_told

Patch data component for source data at the old time in a time interpolation operation.

int SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_src_tnew

Patch data component for source data at the new time in a time interpolation operation.

int SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_scratch

Scratch patch data component

bool SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_fine_bdry_reps_var

Boolean flag that is set to true when it is desired that fine data values have priority over coarse data values when data exists at the same location in the mesh on levels with different resolutions (e.g., nodes that are coincident on consecutive mesh levels).

bool SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_time_interpolate

Boolean flag telling if this item uses time interpolation.

tbox::Pointer<hier::RefineOperator> SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_oprefine

Refinement operator.

tbox::Pointer<hier::TimeInterpolateOperator> SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_optime

Time interpolation operator.

int SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_class_index

Index of equivalence class where this item belongs. All items of the same equivalence class will have the same value.

int SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_tag

An array index telling where this item sits in an array of refine items.

tbox::Pointer<VariableFillPattern> SAMRAI::xfer::RefineClasses::Data::d_var_fill_pattern

VariableFillPattern that can restrict the stencil of the data filled by the RefineSchedule.
